Name: Paul B
AboutMe:
Been in IT since early '86 using computers for DTP (Macs), recording/music production (Pro-24, eMagic on Atari's!) but now loving Ubuntu and Open Source (and also M$). Qualified Organisational (Business Management) Scientist from Lancaster University. Previously a qualified teacher of ICT/Business Management as FE/HE lecturer of 12 years standing. Pro recording studio (home) owner using masses of all things digital (and external analogue) on a Cubase/Tascam DAW platform with loads of VSTs! Company owner and lover of all things German.

Now a WebDev and an aspiring 'have a go' web-preneur who is always 'creative' and trying out new things. Trying to build some good sites using Drupal with my ever streaming imagination of web ideas!
